byline.contributor: Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin.

abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel, Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin, French Pres Francois Hollande and Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko meet in Germany to discuss ongoing fighting in Ukraine and possibility of restarting cease-fire negotiations; update to conditions on ground in Ukraine provided.
lead_paragraph: A summit meeting in Germany was a test of whether President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia will cut a deal to end the conflict while he also faces pressure over Syria.
snippet: A summit meeting in Germany was a test of whether President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia will cut a deal to end the conflict while he also faces pressure over Syria....

headline.main: As New Ukraine Talks Begin, What Is the State of Europe’s Only Active War?
headline.print_headline: As New Talks Begin, an Update on the War in Ukraine
